Articles.Content:
I played KSP for a bit back when there was only Kerbin and Mun.

After buying a new computer, I decided to get back into it.

I've put three satellites into space so far. One in low orbit around Kerbin, one in keosynchronous (like geosynchronous but around Kerbin) orbit, and one around Mun.

I hope to use this forum to further my abilities!

Yay 0.20!

Welcome back. Must be strange to see how much the game has changed and progressed since you last played it.

Have fun playing

Welcome (back) to the forums!

You'll find that a lot has changed in the time you've been away. The game's really opened up a lot in its scope, even just in the short time I've been here.

I'd highly recommend that you check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which has tons of resources for players of all skill levels. Don't be afraid to ask any questions you might have in the How To forums, as the people who hang out around there are very knowledgeable.

Happy landings!
